headline: Trailblazers Are Given Their Due
abstract: This yearâ€™s edition of the Focus Festival commemorates the centennial of the 19th Amendment with a globe-trotting survey of music by women.
lead_paragraph: The music of Beethoven will be inescapable this year, as orchestras around the world celebrate his 250th birthday. But the Juilliard School has another anniversary in mind for its upcoming Focus Festival: the centennial of the 19th Amendment.
